name: SubstanceNucleicAcid.subunit.sugar.residueSite
title: SubstanceNucleicAcid.subunit.sugar.residueSite
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: The residues that contain a given sugar will be captured. The order of given residues will be captured in the 5‘-3‘direction consistent with the base sequences listed above
